title: Commission Regulation (EC) No 1952/1999 of 13 September 1999 prohibiting fishing for common sole by vessels flying the flag of Belgium
header:
COMMISSION REGULATION (EC) No 1952/1999
of 13 September 1999
prohibiting fishing for common sole by vessels flying the flag of Belgium
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body:
Catches of common sole in the waters of ICES division VIIIa,b by vessels flying the flag of Belgium or registered in Belgium are hereby deemed to have exhausted the quota allocated to Belgium for 1999.
Fishing for common sole in the waters of ICES division VIIIa,b by vessels flying the flag of Belgium or registered in Belgium is hereby prohibited, as are the retention on board, transhipment and landing of this stock caught by the above vessels after the date of application of this Regulation.

This Regulation shall enter into force on the day following its publication in the Official Journal of the European Communities.
It shall apply from 19 August 1999.
This Regulation shall be binding in its entirety and directly applicable in all Member States.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 13 September 1999.
For the Commission
Franz FISCHLER
